dict.string: Fix crash on Ball and Sticks mode
Fix crash on Ball and Sticks visualization mode when the file contained no bonds.
Fix "Show all models" option missing on iPhone when working with multi-MODEL files.
Subsections of options in the Appearance tab are now collapsible.
Added more atom types that are recognized and show the correct Van der Waals radius (Na, P, Cl, Ca).
Renderer has been updated to be up to 70% on some devices and proteins.
Removed left sidebar (initial screen on iPhone) since it's not currently being used.
Option for showing all MODEL records at once
PDBs containing several MODEL records of the same protein (for example, a biological assembly of a virus capsid) can now be shown at once.
Support for up to 512 subunit colors.
Color options UI is now collapsible. Useful when dealing with proteins with many subunits, where scrolling to the bottom of the list to see other options was impractical.
Fixes shadow rendering bug on most devices.
Fixes crash when trying to display small proteins on older devices.
Fix rendering bug on Intel Macs
Fixes rendering bug on Intel Macs.
Atom radius can now be specified and scaled. Available on both the solid spheres and the ball and stick visualization modes.
PDBs containing several models are now supported.
More atom elements are now detected and given the appropriate radius and a unique color.
Fixes a crash on some PDBs containing certain HETATM records.
Molecules and proteins displayed now have the correct chirality (whoopsie).
Fixes a crash when showing the share dialog for photos taken on iPadOS.
